mapper.select: select * from members where email like #{email}
mapper.insert: insert into members(id, email, pw, name, gender, hp, hpopen, birthday, address, talentDt, talentGet) values(memseq.nextval, #{email}, #{pw}, #{name}, #{gender}, #{hp}, #{hpopen}, #{birthday}, #{address}, #{talentDt}, #{talentGet})
mapper.select: select * from members where name=#{name} and hp=#{hp}
select * from members where email=#{email} and name=#{name}
